DOC.brief_summary: This study examine impact culturally tailor version contingency management treatment alcohol 400 alcohol dependent American Indians Alaskan Natives . Participants recruit addiction treatment agency throughout community . Those complete 4 week induction period randomize receive 12 week contingency management non-contingent control condition . Individuals follow additional 3-months ass long term efficacy treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Motivational Incentives Alcohol Abstinence American Indian Native Alaskan Adults
DOC.criteria: Self report American Indian/Alaskan Native Current alcohol dependence 5 standard drink 5 occasion last 30 day Ability read speak English Ability provide write informed consent Illicit drug use ( except marijuana ) , prescription amphetamine opioid drug use last 90 day Marijuana use great alcohol use last 90 day A risk dangerous alcohol withdrawal Any medical psychiatric condition , organic brain disorder , dementia , psychotic disorder
